metadata.synopsis: The refugees make a run for it, when the bhaal cultists are defeated and they have a chance to run away.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load up CTY_Main_AGo to -27; 22; 804 defeat all the bhaal cultistsOne of the refugees will say this as they run away.

0.speaker: Refugee Sconnor
0.text: Go! We won't get another chance!
0.context: NodeContext: Frantic, fleeing combat while the player has the enemy distracted.
